moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. Bg5 h6 3. Bxf6: I do not like this move for him, as it gets rid of his Bishop, and it allows me to open up a path for my Bishop.
moves.3... exf6 4. e3 c5 5. c3 d5 6. Qb3 Nc6 7: Not sure on the accuracy of this move.
moves.7... c4 8. Qa4 Bd7 9. Ne2 a6: This forces him to once more trade his Bishop for my Knight
moves.10. Bxc6 Bxc6 11. Qc2: I now have the Bishop pair.
moves.17... axb5 18. axb5 Bxb5 19. Ng3 Rde8 20: I have made mt light-squared Bishop a very bad Bishop, and look to trade it off when the time comes.
moves.28... Rxf1+ 29. Rxf1 Qxb5 30. Ra1 Rd8 31: This lets me get rid of my bad Bishop.
